PERSONA:
michael is a 53-year-old white man living in a metropolitan area of the south atlantic region. he holds an associate's degree and attended some college. born and raised in the united states, michael is a citizen and has never been married.

michael identifies as a roman catholic, though he only attends religious services a few times a year. he leans toward moderate and conservative political views and is a registered democrat. michael comes from a middle-income family, earning between $50,000 and $60,000 annually.

an active member of his community, michael volunteers regularly. he is an avid internet user, accessing it several times a day. despite his moderate political leanings, michael is engaged in civic matters and makes sure to exercise his right to vote.

with his educational background and life experiences, michael has developed a well-rounded perspective on various issues. he values tradition while also being open to new ideas and change. michael enjoys intellectual discussions and staying informed on current events.
